BR_text.BRsummary: ' npm run build' command failed while running BentoML Web UI
BR_text.BRdescription:
Trying to run BentoML Web UI.Followed the section 'How to run and develop BentoML Web UI from '<denchmark-link:https://github.com/bentoml/BentoML/blob/master/DEVELOPMENT.md>https://github.com/bentoml/BentoML/blob/master/DEVELOPMENT.md</denchmark-link>
  to load the UI.
 After running the yarn and npm run build commands as directed its throwing errors and UI is not getting loaded.
 To Reproduce
 Steps to reproduce the behavior:
 
 
 Go to 'https://github.com/bentoml/BentoML/blob/master/DEVELOPMENT.md'
 
 
 Scroll down to 'How to run and develop BentoML Web UI'
 
 
 See error while running it in my local environment.
 npm ERR! code ELIFECYCLE
 npm ERR! errno 1
 npm ERR! yatai_web_server@0.0.1 build: rm -rf dist && concurrently "npm run build:client" "npm run build:server"
 npm ERR! Exit status 1
 npm ERR!
 npm ERR! Failed at the yatai_web_server@0.0.1 build script.
 npm ERR! This is probably not a problem with npm. There is likely additional logging output above.
 
 
 npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
 npm ERR!     /home/aicoe/.npm/_logs/2020-07-09T07_27_46_729Z-debug.log
 Expected behavior
 WebUI served on Localhost
 
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10370721/87456004-f41e4180-c623-11ea-85ec-b9367b89ded8.png></denchmark-link>
 
 Environment:
 
 
 OS: Ubuntu 18.04
 
 
 Python/BentoML Version [ Python 3.7.1, BentoML-0.8.2]
 
 
 Node version -v12.8.0
 -Yarn Version - 1.22.4

comments_0.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/athulprathap>@athulprathap</denchmark-link>
  Thank you for catching this bug!
 This bug was caused by Mac ignore case difference (./App and ./app) when importing other files.
